What an excellent, delicious, fresh and affordable experience. I recommend this whole-heartedly to any tourist looking for a fresh, amazing seafood meal for a good price. Here, things work a little different: You stand at the front counter, and just point to all the different food you want. It's possible to specify how much as well. We ordered: one massive stuffed crab, tons of razor clams, about 12 gambas, a big bowl of steamed mussels in tomato sauce, some fried squiggly things (very good), and a salad (why?). Two beers as well.The price is all by weight. We had so much food that I thought I was actually going to burst, and it was €20 each. Incredible. They're open for lunch or for dinner, and the food is some of the freshest in Barcelona. It goes right from the ocean into the restaurant. Just amazing. Go hungry!!
